item.title: 臃肿的华尔街牛市正在大规模套现离场
item.description: 随着华尔街一度所向披靡的牛市大军开始撤出赢利，2024 年的市场大反弹似乎岌岌可危。【原文：The great market rally of 2024 looks dangerously close to unraveling as Wall Street’s once-invincible bull brigade begins to withdraw its winnings.】

item.title: 科技股创 2022 年以来最大单周跌幅令市场动荡不安
item.description: 受中东紧张局势和对利率前景的担忧影响，美国股市周五大幅抛售，科技股创下17个月以来的最大单周跌幅。【原文：US equities sold off sharply on Friday, sending tech stocks to the biggest weekly loss in 17 months, due to tensions in the Middle East and worries over the outlook for interest rates.】

item.title: FTX 投资者与山姆-班克曼-弗里德达成和解，将起诉发起人
item.description: 一群 FTX 投资者和客户同意放弃对联合创始人山姆-班克曼-弗里德（Sam Bankman-Fried）的索赔，以换取他在加密货币交易所倒闭引发的一系列诉讼中对其他被告的合作。【原文：A group of FTX investors and customers has agreed to drop their claims against co-founder Sam Bankman-Fried in exchange for his cooperation against other defendants in a sprawling set of lawsuits over the cryptocurrency exchange’s collapse.】

item.title: 美联储推迟降息对美国和世界的意义
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会及其全球广大受众都认为 2024 年将是降息的大好时机。但事实证明，物价上涨比几乎所有人预测的都要顽固得多，这种预期正在迅速消退。美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔在4月16日证实了这一点，他表示，在一系列出人意料的高通胀数据公布后，政策制定者将等待比之前预期更长的时间才会降息。【原文：The US Federal Reserve and its vast global audience thought 2024 would be a rate-cut bonanza. But with price inflation proving much stickier than almost anyone predicted, those expectations are fading fast. Fed Chair Jerome Powell confirmed as much on April 16, when he signaled that policymakers would wait longer than previously anticipated to cut rates following a series of surprisingly high inflation readings.】

item.title: 马克莱姆认为加拿大预算案对财政影响不大
item.description: 加拿大央行行长蒂夫-马克莱姆（Tiff Macklem）表示，总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）最近的预算案并没有明显改变政府在 11 月份制定的财政路线。【原文：Bank of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem said Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s recent budget did not significantly change the fiscal track that the government laid out in November.】

item.title: 贝莱德计划首次将共同基金转换为ETF，这是时代的标志
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc. laid out plans for its first mutual fund-to-ETF conversion this week, joining a growing list of asset managers who have made the jump amid a one-way flood of cash between the structures.】

item.title: 欧洲央行利率制定者就 6 月降息达成一致，但其他问题不多
item.description: 有一点欧洲中央银行的官员们似乎达成了共识，即首次降息可能会在 6 月份进行。【原文：There’s one thing European Central Bank officials seem to agree on — that a first cut in interest rates will probably be delivered in June.】

item.title: 中国人民银行行长意外公布 GDP 后淡化人民币和通货紧缩风险
item.description: 中国央行行长潘功胜淡化了通货紧缩和人民币走软带来的风险，并强调中国经济在 2024 年的强劲开局使得 5%的官方增长目标指日可待。【原文：China’s central bank governor Pan Gongsheng downplayed risks from deflation and a weakening yuan and stressed that his econony’s strong start to 2024 put the official 5% growth target within reach.】

item.title: 嘉能可和特拉菲古拉的制裁游戏正在耗尽伦敦金属交易所的资金
item.description: 世界上最大的两家金属交易商正着手从伦敦金属交易所撤出大量铝，英国对俄罗斯金属的新制裁使这一复杂的交易成为可能，从而引发了对新规则意外后果的质疑。【原文：The world’s two biggest metals traders are moving to withdraw large volumes of aluminum from the London Metal Exchange in a complex trade made possible by new UK sanctions on Russian metal, raising questions about unintended consequences from the new rules.】

item.title: 纳税时间推动银行和货币市场基金增加现金储备
item.description: 现在，一大批美国人已经缴纳了税款，随着现金在金融系统中的流动，里程碑已经确立，未来可能对美联储缩减资产负债表产生更广泛的影响。【原文：Now that a large swath of Americans have paid their tax bills, milestones have been set as cash sloshed through the financial system with broader implications ahead potentially for the Federal Reserve unwinding its balance sheet.】

item.title: 灰度比特币基金即将被贝莱德收购
item.description:
IBIT 追赶 GBTC

【原文：

IBIT catches up to GBTC

】

item.title: 奇货通讯：中国焦虑的真正原因
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读每周一期的《奇货》时事通讯，乔-魏森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）将为您带来他们对市场、金融和经济领域最有趣发展的看法。【原文：Hello and welcome to the weekly Odd Lots newsletter, where Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway bring you their thoughts on the most interesting developments in markets, finance and economy.】

item.title: Blackstone 向 Ares 出售 11 亿美元私募股权投资基金股权
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 的 Strategic Partners 部门将价值 11 亿美元的私募股权投资基金权益组合出售给 Ares Management Corp.【原文：Blackstone Inc.’s Strategic Partners unit sold a $1.1 billion portfolio of private equity fund interests to Ares Management Corp.】

item.title: 麦德林市长称哥伦比亚政府寻求控制 EPM
item.description: 麦德林市领导人费德里科-古铁雷斯（Federico Gutierrez）在 X 网站上发表文章称，哥伦比亚政府正计划接管麦德林公用事业公司。【原文：The Colombian government is planning to take control of utility Empresas Publicas de Medellin, city leader Federico Gutierrez said in a post on X.】

item.title: 随着美联储推迟减息，多边基金损失了自 2022 年以来最多的现金
item.description: 投资者以一年多来最快的速度从市政债券基金中撤资，因为他们出售资产以支付所得税，并试图在美联储将在更长时间内维持更高利率的信号下保护收益。【原文：Investors yanked money from municipal bond funds at the fastest clip in more than a year as they sold assets to pay income taxes and tried to protect returns amid signals that the Federal Reserve will keep rates higher for longer.】

item.title: 洛杉矶联合学区寻求放弃 "建设美国 "债券
item.description: 下周，洛杉矶联合学区将前往华尔街，以降低其部分未偿债务的成本，此次债券销售正值穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）在最近上调其发行人信用评级时提到的推动支出与入学率下降保持一致之际。【原文：The Los Angeles Unified School District is heading to Wall Street next week to lower the cost on some of its outstanding debt, a bond sale that comes amid a push to align spending with declining enrollment that was cited by Moody’s Ratings when it raised its issuer credit rating recently.】

item.title: 据称 Ardian 将参与竞购 Altice 价值 70 亿欧元的 XpFibre 部门
item.description: 据知情人士透露，欧洲私募股权公司 Ardian 正在考虑收购电信大亨 Patrick Drahi 的法国光纤公司 XpFibre 的控股权。【原文：European private equity firm Ardian is considering a potential offer for a controlling stake in telecom tycoon Patrick Drahi’s French fiber company XpFibre, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 纳格尔称，即使开始削减，欧洲央行仍需保持限制性政策
特朗普媒体称非法卖空令其股票下跌
item.description: 特朗普媒体与科技集团公司（Trump Media & Technology Group Corp.【原文：Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. says an illegal form of short selling might be behind the battering of its stock and it’s asking regulators at Nasdaq Inc. to step in.】

item.title: 大麻改革带来大麻股上涨动力
item.description: 投资者纷纷涌入廉价大麻股，希望美国政策的改变能为大麻公司带来重大利好。【原文：Investors have been diving into cheap pot stocks in hopes that a change in US policy will unlock major upside for cannabis companies.】

item.title: 里士满联储主席巴尔金认为需求 "健康但不过热
item.description:
"政策路径非常直截了当，"他说。【原文：

‘The policy path is pretty straightforward,’ he says.

】

item.title: 刚果铜矿因担心辐射而暂停开采
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由于担心钴矿中的辐射超标，紫金矿业集团有限公司（Zijin Mining Group Ltd.）在刚果民主共和国的铜钴矿已经暂停运营。【原文：Operations at a Zijin Mining Group Ltd. copper and cobalt mine in the Democratic Republic of Congo have been suspended due to worries about excessive radiation in its cobalt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 北约盟国承诺为乌克兰提供更多防空系统
item.description: 北约秘书长延斯-斯托尔滕贝格（Jens Stoltenberg）说，盟国已确定为乌克兰提供更多防空设备，包括爱国者（Patriot）和 SAMP/T 系统。【原文：NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg said allies have identified additional air defense equipment for Ukraine, including Patriot and SAMP/T systems.】

item.title: 运输指数暴跌，预示美国股市面临风险
item.description: 作为美国经济风向标的货物运输公司本周发出了一个烟雾信号。【原文：Companies that move goods around and serve as a bellwether for the American economy sent up a smoke signal this week.】

item.title: 驶往中国的超级油轮跃升至一年来最高水平
item.description: 向中国运输原油的超级油轮飙升至近一年来的最高水平。【原文：Supertankers hauling crude oil to China surged to the highest in almost a year.】

item.title: Adnoc 部门考虑投资 UGI 的丙烷业务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，阿布扎比国家石油公司（Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.【原文：A unit of Abu Dhabi National Oil Co. is considering a potential investment in UGI Corp.’s propane distribution unit AmeriGas, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: StanChart 因违反伊朗制裁规定面临 15 亿英镑索赔
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）被指控为赢得新业务而系统性地违反了伊朗制裁，在伦敦的一次审判中，渣打银行面临着价值约 15 亿英镑（19 亿美元）的投资者索赔。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc is facing about £1.5 billion ($1.9 billion) worth of investor claims at a London trial over allegations it systematically breached Iranian sanctions to win new business.】

item.title: 超微因盈利担忧跌至近两个月低点
item.description: 超级微型计算机公司（Super Micro Computer Inc.【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc. shares are seeing their biggest drop in about two months on Friday, after the maker of servers announced the date of its third-quarter results but didn’t pre-announce results.】

item.title: 潮人花苞、Netflix提价和伊朗对股市意味着什么？
item.description:
地缘政治和盈利在令人眼花缭乱的分屏中争夺华尔街的注意力

。【原文：

Geopolitics and earnings jostle for Wall Street’s attention in dizzying split screen

】

item.title: 摩根士丹利从摩根大通聘请交易员 Andy Lipsky
item.description: 据知情人士透露，摩根士丹利已聘请摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Morgan Stanley has hired Andy Lipsky, JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s vice chair of investment banking, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】
